description: This file defines the main routing component for a React frontend application, establishing routes for Splash, Home, and Login pages, and a layout component with a persistent top menu that includes navigation sections.

classes.name: PageLayout
classes.description: A React component that provides a theme container with a persistent top menu and renders child content. It uses useMemo to memoize menu section data.

methods.name: AppRouter()
methods.description: React functional component that sets up routing for the app, including Splash, Home, Login pages, and redirects all other routes to the root.

methods.name: PageLayout({ children })
methods.description: React functional component that provides a page layout including a TopMenu with navigation sections and renders children content.
